snippet: Ang Lee, newly minted director nominee, says working with digital characters like Richard Parker, the tiger in "Life of Pi," means no getting into arguments with actors, but it also means a lot more work for him.
abstract: Ang Lee, newly minted director nominee, says working with digital characters like Richard Parker, the tiger in "Life of Pi," means no getting into arguments with actors, but it also means a lot more work for him.

headline.main: Ang Lee on the Digital Characters Who Can't Argue Back
